title: End-of-season rewads
body:
So I had a 14-days ban on this account that expired on 7/14 this year and asking if I'll access the end of season rewards.

Does the fact that I am (and likely will be at the end of the season) honor level 0 will prevent me from earning same rewards as last season? (Summoner Icon, Profile Banner Trim, Loading Screen Border, Invite Flair, Victorious Champion Skin)

replies.body: Depends on when exactly the 14 day was.  We posted [a ranked eligibility requirements ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068-2017-Ranked-Rewards-Eligibility)article here that should help.  If your suspension was from  8/22/2017 then you might not be eligible.  If you have any questions or concerns, definitely hit up our PB team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
